attributes.action: To change the Maths GCSE back to the old one as everyone is failing the new one
attributes.background: I was getting B's on the old GCSE maths paper but since the introduction of the new format, I am failing drastically. But, I am not the only one, more than 50% of students are going home with grade 2's and 3's which is disappointed as they were getting C's and B's on the old format papers.
